project.name: next-portfolio
project.description: Personal portfolio website built with Next.js 16, React 19, and TypeScript

conventions.fileNaming: camelCase for components, kebab-case for utilities
conventions.componentStyle: Server Components by default, 'use client' only when necessary
conventions.exportStyle: Prefer named exports for components instead of default exports
conventions.stateManagement: Zustand for client state, Server Components for server state

nextjs.version: Next.js 16 - middleware should use 'proxy' instead of 'middleware' in next.config
nextjs.layouts: ALWAYS use Server Components (async) for layouts
nextjs.pages: PREFER Server Components (async) for pages - use 'use client' only when interactivity is required
nextjs.dataFetching: Use cookies() and headers() APIs in Server Components for authentication
nextjs.clientComponents: Only mark as 'use client' when using React hooks, browser APIs, or event handlers
nextjs.middleware: In Next.js 16, use proxy configuration instead of middleware.ts for request handling where applicable

codeQuality: This project uses Next.js 16 - prefer proxy configuration over middleware.ts where applicable
Prefer Server Components over Client Components for all Next.js layouts and pages
Next.js pages should be async Server Components by default, accessing cookies/headers for auth
Only use 'use client' directive when component needs React hooks, state, or browser APIs
Use named exports for components instead of default exports (except for Next.js pages/layouts/route handlers)
Implement proper error handling with logging
Add proper accessibility attributes (aria-labels, semantic HTML)
Use proper SEO metadata with generateMetadata
testing: Write tests for critical business logic
Use React Testing Library for component tests
